description: This file defines an interface 'ILocalStore' in C++ for local storage operations, including methods for opening, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries and counts, removing entries, and adding entries. It also includes a type alias for a shared pointer to this interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface defining methods for local storage management, including opening, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries and counts, removing entries, and adding entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table with the specified name.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets an entry limit for the specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in the table from a start index up to maxCount.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from the table starting at a specific index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from the table within the specified start and end indices.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to the specified table.
